details.title: Evaluation of agile manufacturing enterprises
details.abstract: Agile manufacturing is an important manufacturing philosophy to develop advanced manufacturing enterprises to improve competivity. The evaluation of Agile Manufacturing Enterprises (AME) is one of the key activities in implementing agile manufacturing. This paper proposes a method for evaluating AME, establishes a basic feature model of AME based on the feature tree and discusses the hierarchical decomposition algorithm based on the model with an example.
